page.title: 05MORE HOUSES IN CLUTTON
page.content: {THE WHITE COTTAGE } I live in the White Cottage which has a lounge,a kitchen,a living room,4 bedrooms, a bathroom, a toilet downstairs, a playroom and a spare room. It was built in the{16th century and was originally 2 small cottages. Underneath the floorboards in the lounge is a well. At the back of the house is a 6foot wall which the railway track ran along. We have about 3/4s acre of land. {11,MAYNARD TERRACE} Our house was a miner's cottage built in 1900. There are 56 houses in Maynard Terrace. I live in number 11. They are quite small. They have 3 bedrooms,2 small living rooms,1 kitchen and 1 bathroom. Both of our gardens together are approximately 1/2 acre.
